alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:30AM MDT until July 24 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BON HOMME...NORTHWESTERN YANKTON AND SOUTHWESTERN HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 229 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Scotland, or 9 miles northeast of Tyndall, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...At 217 am trained weather spotters 2 miles NNE Tyndal reported golf ball sized hail. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Tabor and Utica. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
